item.title: The Ultimate Linux Guide for Hackers ;)
item.description:
Being a Linux user is, above all, a life style. Interestingly, more and more people have been joining this community, keeping it dynamic and organic.

Linux has been in my life since my high school years and I'm still constantly inspired by the fact that it has not lost any …
item.dc:creator: Marina von Steinkirch

item.title: That's What Love Looks Like
item.description:
I'm talking about this day that was all about love.

I am not actually talking, I'm showing my pictures.

The People's Climate March, which happened a couple of weeks ago in NYC, filled my veins with hope. No words are able to express what each of these pictures say.

The …
